title: Tyranny is Everywhere (1242)
description:
In this episode I address the fight against the unconstitutional lockdowns, and why it matters to you. I also address troubling new information about the plot to take down General Mike Flynn. Finally, I address the latest on the Joe Biden scandal. 

News Picks:

Don’t miss my interview with President Trump. 

Shocking. A Maryland lawmaker alleges he was threatened with arrest for trying to speak out against the unconstitutional lockdowns.


We are releasing criminals, while arresting Americans for trying to feed their kids and keep their business afloat?

Are there food shortages coming?

We are in the process of destroying our hospitals in the name of “public health”? 

CNN misses an opportunity to ask Nancy Pelosi a key question about this new “non-partisan,” anti-Trump panel. 

The Constitution is NOT optional!

Breaking: The intell community & the Wuhan Virus origins. 


The Epoch Times article discussed in the show today.

The Washington Times article about Lovinger discussed in the show today.


﻿Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
